title: I switched phone's screen from left hand to right handed bias and cannot find control to reverse
content: I inadvertently switched my phone's screen from left hand to right hand bias, so all the blue slider buttons are reversed, as is gmail etc. I assume there's a button some where, but I cannot find it in Display or Accessibility settings. Phone is working fine, but its  annoying. Any help would be greatly appreciated.Thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 4a
